hero.description: A space to share the hobby, play games, and promote the Catalan language through gaming.

about.title: Who are we?
about.text: Darkstone Catalunya is a non-profit association dedicated to promoting board games and role-playing games. Our goal is to create a meeting point for players of all levels in an inclusive and friendly environment.
about.highlight1_desc: We promote the use of the Catalan language in the gaming sphere.
about.highlight2_desc: We have a wide collection of games available to members.

activities.title: What do we do?
activities.text: We organize weekly games, tournaments, demonstrations, and open houses.

location.title: Location
location.hours: Hours: Fridays 17:00 to 23:00 and Saturdays 10:00 to 23:00
